thread.title: Here’s More Street Style Excellence From Milan Fashion Week FW17
thread.title_full: Here’s More Street Style Excellence From Milan Fashion Week FW17

author: Kam Dhillon
title: Here’s More Street Style Excellence From Milan Fashion Week FW17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 23 images from this gallery. 
Location: Milan, Italy
Season: FW17
Key Looks: Sita Abellán throwing honey-lensed shade (slide #12,) the boxy Balenciaga denim jacket (slide #1,) and pattern mixing 101 (slide #23.)
Editor’s Notes: Milan’s finest are flexing their boldest and bravest looks with plenty of head-to-toe GUCCI floating around, as expected. Once again, the half-on, half-off look continues to linger (slide #13) and there’s an absolute murderous lesson in avant-garde utilitarianism (slide #14) where simple staples like the logo sweatshirt and vintage denim are upgraded with big, brash accessories.
For more street style inspo, check out what London’s streetwear cognoscenti wore at Palace’s SS17 launch.
